_sText:
Like my stuff? simply paste the maps folder into your cstrike folder ======== there are 3 floors and a jail, in about 3 minutes of game play, a teleport will be triggered for everybody to go to jail, the map is small so this should really only affect the AFK's since it woulden't take more that 3 minutes to either die, go to jail, or simply to jack around. there are monitors that display the jail, and from the jail you can switch the "channel" and see around the map. in this map, your in the...i guess...the art section or w/e kinda not really, ill let you decide the theme _/(O.o)\_

enjoy!

P.S. (I say 18 players because its a small map but there are 32 spawns)
